Store from upper computer
=========================

This sample code shows how to store a fingerprint from upper computer
into a location in the flash library of the module. The first part of
the code makes use of `enroll_to_upper_computer`_ function from the 
`Enroll to upper computer example`_.
.. `_enroll_to_upper_computer` _enroll_to_upper_computer
.. `_Enroll to upper computer exampler` _enroll_to_upper_computer

.. literalinclude:: ../../../examples/enroll_to_flash_library.py
    :language: python
